extendedInfo.description: Allow yourself to be gently guided into peacful, restful sleep by tranquil sound. Deep Slumber Audio Suite 1 - Easy Sleep Enhancement for Better Rest - Powered by PsimatiXâ¢ proprietary brainwave audio technology. Created by internationally recognized brainwave audio entrainment expert Leigh Spusta, this app has been specifically arranged to provide a very simple way to help you to fall asleep easily and get the rest you need.It is a proven fact that getting enough quality sleep is absolutely essential for your physical, mental, and emotional well being. Some of us have occasions of restlessness, and still others of us suffer a more chronic lack of sleep. One very effective, safe, and natural method to aid in getting to sleep is audio entrainment technology.This collection was created to assist you in falling asleep quickly and easily by bringing your body into deep physical relaxation, and completely calming your mind, entering into a dreamy feeling that leads naturally into peacful, restful sleep. Targets a low alpha and theta brainwave state by Utilizing PsimatiXâ¢ proprietary audio technology. These tracks can also be used for self hypnosis, meditation, and to unwind and de-stress.Do not drive or operate any machinery while using this application. This app streams via 3G or wifi connection. Leigh Spusta is a behavioral scientist, hypnotherapist, and Certified Therapeutic Imagery Facilitator specializing in the use of sound frequencies to produce deep, relaxing trance states. He has worked with several therapists in Los Angeles, producing a variety of therapeutic audio cds. Leigh combines his talents as a musician and his knowledge of hypnosis and related states, in an effort to pioneer new approaches in creating rich, resonant sound-scapes for greater efficacy in healing and meditative products. Leigh is the developer of the proprietary PsimatiXâ¢ therapeutic approaches and technologies.Brainwave Entrainment / Binaural Beats / Isochronic Tones / Monaural Beats / Vibro-acoustics / Hemispheric Synchronization / Alpha State / Theta State / Delta State / Relaxation / Hypnosis / Hypnotic Music / Meditation / Stress Reduction / Tension Release / Chakra Alignment - Attunement - Balancing / Harmony / Schumann Resonance / Frequency / Mind Audio / Trance / Healing / Therapy

reviews.comment: Love this. Very relaxing, always helps me sleep. Great customer service would give 10 stars. Love all these apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, would love more options.
reviews.comment: Good audio files, needs caching option for when out of coverage and option to repeat, play next song, etc.
